body: Just another question, Is there a way to output only the idf file without opening the energy plus in open studio , I am running parallel simulation. here's the link of the conversations we had [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/running-several-e-simulat...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/running-several-e-simulations-at-a-time?groupUrl=ladybug&xg_source=activity&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987&id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1366608&page=5#comments) and the image of parallel simulation that I am using(Mostapha's example). If I use the run energy simulation component it shows error! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0VDyeNsf-iFsDoY00jcfk5a1pbS6sg1mGLKZY1zw59MEfxzg6yLBvybOjghzT76TIX3rbE6boqjoIc7h1PYB-POe2XvCoEaU/parallelSImulation.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0VDyeNsf-iFzS5gdUFJ7*Y5OrjDTM1HyTw3MZXyitU*zrZp4E**CDjR-I5mWWtY3lwufdSv1gOQDasd7oJJon-1C*PgEK57Z/error.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0VDyeNsf-iFzS5gdUFJ7*Y5OrjDTM1HyTw3MZXyitU*zrZp4E**CDjR-I5mWWtY3lwufdSv1gOQDasd7oJJon-1C*PgEK57Z/error.PNG)
